reviewText: Awesome experimental film. The vignettes stay interesting. Not much is offered to the viewer but it is a good movie even as a whole.

It is what it says it is - a celebration of one hundred years of Mexican  history.  Watch it a second time and you will like it even more.  You see, it is not intended to be like an ordinary film and a second viewing with allow you to get past that expectation.

Some of these stories were interested. The one with the party I had to fastforward on. I didn't quite understand the stories, but just to be fair I gave it 4 stars anyway. I realize this is not meant to be a Hollywood production.
